content.title: Why we use {align-content} Property?
content.answer_1: Specifies the alignment for items inside a flexible container
content.answer_2: Sets the color of the bottom border
content.answer_3: Specifies whether an animation should be played forwards, backwards or in alternate cycles
content.answer_4: Specifies the alignment between the lines inside a flexible container when the items do not use all available space
content.right_answer: Specifies the alignment for items inside a flexible container
